verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בֹּ֖א <S%H935><s%> Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5647><s%> that they may serve

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if מָאֵ֥ן <S%H3986><s%> And if thou refuse אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לְשַׁלֵּ֑חַ <S%H7971><s%> to let [them] go הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I נֹגֵ֛ף <S%H5062><s%> behold I will smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> your whole גְּבוּלְךָ֖ <S%H1366><s%> all thy borders בַּֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃ <S%H6854><s%> with frogs

וְשָׁרַ֣ץ <S%H8317><s%> abundantly הַיְאֹר֮ <S%H2975><s%> And the river צְפַרְדְּעִים֒ <S%H6854><s%> frogs וְעָלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> which shall go up וּבָ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> into thine house וּבַחֲדַ֥ר <S%H2315><s%> chamber מִשְׁכָּבְךָ֖ <S%H4904><s%> bed וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on מִטָּתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4296><s%> and upon thy bed וּבְבֵ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> and into the house עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servants וּבְעַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> and upon thy people וּבְתַנּוּרֶ֖יךָ <S%H8574><s%> and into thine ovens וּבְמִשְׁאֲרוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4863><s%> and into thy kneadingtroughs

וּבְכָ֥ה וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> both on thee and upon thy people וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H5650><s%> and upon all thy servants יַעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> shall come up הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִֽים׃ <S%H6854><s%> And the frogs

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron נְטֵ֤ה <S%H5186><s%> Stretch forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand בְּמַטֶּ֔ךָ <S%H4294><s%> with thy rod עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַ֨נְּהָרֹ֔ת <S%H5104><s%> over the streams עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַיְאֹרִ֖ים <S%H2975><s%> over the rivers וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over הָאֲגַמִּ֑ים <S%H98><s%> and over the ponds וְהַ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> to come up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <S%H6854><s%> and cause frogs עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיֵּ֤ט <S%H5186><s%> stretched out אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over מֵימֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> over the waters מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַתַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> came up הַצְּפַרְדֵּ֔עַ <S%H6854><s%> and the frogs וַתְּכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> and covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> did כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> the same הַֽחֲרְטֻמִּ֖ים <S%H2748><s%> And the magicians בְּלָטֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3909><s%> so with their enchantments וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> and brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <S%H6854><s%> frogs עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called פַרְעֹ֜ה <S%H6547><s%> Then Pharaoh לְמֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> for Moses וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said הַעְתִּ֣ירוּ <S%H6279><s%> Intreat אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְיָסֵר֙ <S%H5493><s%> that he may take away הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <S%H6854><s%> the frogs מִמֶּ֖נִּי <S%H4480><s%> and from וּמֵֽעַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> from me and from my people וַאֲשַׁלְּחָה֙ <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> and I will let the people וְיִזְבְּח֖וּ <S%H2076><s%> that they may do sacrifice לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לְפַרְעֹה֮ <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh הִתְפָּאֵ֣ר <S%H6286><s%> Glory עָלַי֒ <S%H5921><s%> and לְמָתַ֣י ׀ <S%H4970><s%> over me when אַעְתִּ֣יר <S%H6279><s%> shall I intreat לְךָ֗ וְלַעֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> for thee and for thy servants וּֽלְעַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> and for thy people לְהַכְרִית֙ <S%H3772><s%> to destroy הַֽצֲפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <S%H6854><s%> the frogs מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> at וּמִבָּתֶּ֑יךָ <S%H1004><s%> from thee and thy houses רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> in בַּיְאֹ֖ר <S%H2975><s%> in the river תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃ <S%H7604><s%> [that] they may remain

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לְמָחָ֑ר <S%H4279><s%> To morrow וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said כִּדְבָ֣רְךָ֔ <S%H1697><s%> [Be it] according to thy word לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תֵּדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> that thou mayest know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> there כַּיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> that [there is] none like unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God

וְסָר֣וּ <S%H5493><s%> shall depart הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֗ים <S%H6854><s%> And the frogs מִמְּךָ֙ <S%H4480><s%> at וּמִבָּ֣תֶּ֔יךָ <S%H1004><s%> from thee and from thy houses וּמֵעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> and from thy servants וּמֵעַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> and from thy people רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> in בַּיְאֹ֖ר <S%H2975><s%> in the river תִּשָּׁאַֽרְנָה׃ <S%H7604><s%> they shall remain

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went out מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> from Pharaoh וַיִּצְעַ֤ק <S%H6817><s%> cried מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> and Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> because of הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֖ים <S%H6854><s%> the frogs אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> which he had brought לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> against Pharaoh

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses וַיָּמֻ֙תוּ֙ <S%H4191><s%> died הַֽצְפַרְדְּעִ֔ים <S%H6854><s%> and the frogs מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַבָּתִּ֥ים <S%H1004><s%> out of the houses מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַחֲצֵרֹ֖ת <S%H2691><s%> out of the villages וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַשָּׂדֹֽת׃ <S%H7704><s%> and out of the fields

וַיִּצְבְּר֥וּ <S%H6651><s%> And they gathered them together אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> חֳמָרִ֣ם <S%H2563><s%> upon heaps חֳמָרִ֑ם <S%H2563><s%> heaps וַתִּבְאַ֖שׁ <S%H887><s%> stank הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and the land

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> But when Pharaoh כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> there was הָֽרְוָחָ֔ה <S%H7309><s%> that there was respite וְהַכְבֵּד֙ <S%H3513><s%> he hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> his heart וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not שָׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> and hearkened אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> not unto them as the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֱמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> Say אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron נְטֵ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> Stretch out אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַטְּךָ֔ <S%H4294><s%> thy rod וְהַ֖ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> the dust הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> may become לְכִנִּ֖ם <S%H3654><s%> that it may become lice בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> And they did כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> so וַיֵּט֩ <S%H5186><s%> stretched out אַהֲרֹ֨ן <S%H175><s%> so for Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֤וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בְמַטֵּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4294><s%> with his rod וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲפַ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> the dust הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וַתְּהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> became הַכִּנָּ֔ם <S%H3654><s%> and it became lice בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> in man וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and in beast כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֲפַ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> all the dust הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> became כִנִּ֖ים <S%H3654><s%> became lice בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיַּעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> did כֵ֨ן <S%H3651><s%> after that הַחַרְטֻמִּ֧ים <S%H2748><s%> And the magicians בְּלָטֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H3909><s%> so with their enchantments לְהוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> to bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכִּנִּ֖ים <S%H3654><s%> lice וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכֹ֑לוּ <S%H3201><s%> but they could וַתְּהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become הַכִּנָּ֔ם <S%H3654><s%> not so there were lice בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> upon man וּבַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> and upon beast

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> said הַֽחַרְטֻמִּים֙ <S%H2748><s%> Then the magicians אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh אֶצְבַּ֥ע <S%H676><s%> This [is] the finger אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> This וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> was hardened לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> and Pharaoh's וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> and he hearkened אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> not unto them as the LORD ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses הַשְׁכֵּ֤ם <S%H7925><s%> Rise up early בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְהִתְיַצֵּב֙ <S%H3320><s%> and stand לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יוֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> lo he cometh forth הַמָּ֑יְמָה <S%H4325><s%> to the water וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> go עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5647><s%> that they may serve

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֵינְךָ֮ <S%H369><s%> not מְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּי֒ <S%H5971><s%> Else if thou wilt not let my people הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> behold מַשְׁלִ֨יחַ <S%H7971><s%> behold I will send בְּךָ֜ וּבַעֲבָדֶ֧יךָ <S%H5650><s%> [of flies] upon thee and upon thy servants וּֽבְעַמְּךָ֛ <S%H5971><s%> and upon thy people וּבְבָתֶּ֖יךָ <S%H1004><s%> and into thy houses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶעָרֹ֑ב <S%H6157><s%> swarms וּמָ֨לְא֜וּ <S%H4390><s%> shall be full בָּתֵּ֤י <S%H1004><s%> and the houses מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶ֣עָרֹ֔ב <S%H6157><s%> of swarms וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> and also הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> [of flies] and also the ground אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וְהִפְלֵיתִי֩ <S%H6395><s%> And I will sever בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land גֹּ֗שֶׁן <S%H1657><s%> of Goshen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> where עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> in which my people עֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> dwell עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> that לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> that no הֱיֽוֹת־ <S%H1961><s%> [of flies] shall be שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> will be there עָרֹ֑ב <S%H6157><s%> swarms לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> there to the end תֵּדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> thou mayest know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <S%H7760><s%> And I will put פְדֻ֔ת <S%H6304><s%> a division בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> between my people וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> and thy people לְמָחָ֥ר <S%H4279><s%> to morrow יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָאֹ֥ת <S%H226><s%> shall this sign הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> so וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> so and there came עָרֹ֣ב <S%H6157><s%> swarm כָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3515><s%> a grievous בֵּ֥יתָה <S%H1004><s%> [of flies] into the house פַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> houses עֲבָדָ֑יו <S%H5650><s%> and [into] his servants' וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and into all the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt תִּשָּׁחֵ֥ת <S%H7843><s%> was corrupted הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> by reason הֶעָרֹֽב׃ <S%H6157><s%> of the swarm

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וּֽלְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> and for Aaron וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לְכ֛וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go זִבְח֥וּ <S%H2076><s%> ye sacrifice לֵֽאלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> to your God בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> is not נָכוֹן֙ <S%H3559><s%> It is not meet לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> so to do כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> so כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> what תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <S%H8441><s%> the abomination מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian נִזְבַּ֖ח <S%H2076><s%> we shall sacrifice לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> for נִזְבַּ֞ח <S%H2076><s%> lo shall we sacrifice אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹעֲבַ֥ת <S%H8441><s%> the abomination מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> before their eyes וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִסְקְלֻֽנוּ׃ <S%H5619><s%> and will they not stone

דֶּ֚רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> journey שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days' נֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness וְזָבַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H2076><s%> and sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he יֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> as he shall command אֵלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> I אֲשַׁלַּ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> I will let you go אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> וּזְבַחְתֶּ֞ם <S%H2076><s%> that ye may sacrifice לַיהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> your God בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness רַ֛ק <S%H7535><s%> very הַרְחֵ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> very לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תַרְחִ֖יקוּ <S%H7368><s%> far away לָלֶ֑כֶת <S%H1980><s%> go הַעְתִּ֖ירוּ <S%H6279><s%> intreat בַּעֲדִֽי׃ <S%H1157><s%> for me

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I יוֹצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> Behold I go out מֵֽעִמָּךְ֙ <S%H5973><s%> and I וְהַעְתַּרְתִּ֣י <S%H6279><s%> from thee and I will intreat אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְסָ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> [of flies] may depart הֶעָרֹ֗ב <S%H6157><s%> that the swarms מִפַּרְעֹ֛ה <S%H6547><s%> from Pharaoh מֵעֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> from his servants וּמֵעַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and from his people מָחָ֑ר <S%H4279><s%> to morrow רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> but אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3254><s%> any more פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> let not Pharaoh הָתֵ֔ל <S%H2048><s%> deal deceitfully לְבִלְתִּי֙ <S%H1115><s%> in not שַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> letting the people לִזְבֹּ֖חַ <S%H2076><s%> to sacrifice לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> went out מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> from Pharaoh וַיֶּעְתַּ֖ר <S%H6279><s%> and intreated אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses וַיָּ֙סַר֙ <S%H5493><s%> and he removed הֶעָרֹ֔ב <S%H6157><s%> the swarms מִפַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> [of flies] from Pharaoh מֵעֲבָדָ֣יו <S%H5650><s%> from his servants וּמֵעַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and from his people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נִשְׁאַ֖ר <S%H7604><s%> there remained אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> not one

וַיַּכְבֵּ֤ד <S%H3513><s%> hardened פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> his heart גַּ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> also בַּפַּ֣עַם <S%H6471><s%> at this time הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שִׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> also neither would he let the people פ
